value.title: Introduction to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Get familiar with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native, security information and event management (SIEM) service.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Move Azure resources to another resource group
value.excerpt: Learn how to identify Azure resources you can move, and how to move them to a new resource group.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
value.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

value.title: Upload, download, and manage data with Azure Storage Explorer
value.excerpt: Azure Storage Explorer allows you to quickly view all the storage services under your account. You can browse through, read, and edit data stored in those services through a user-friendly graphical interface.

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: Azure Certifications for developers | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the Azure Certifications for developers.    For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to create App Services in the Azure portal | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create web apps using the Azure App service in the Azure portal.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com    Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal     And make sure to keep an eye

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Deploy and configure servers, instances, and databases for Azure SQL

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: Expose multiple Azure Function apps as a consistent API by using Azure API Management
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to assemble multiple Azure Functions into a single API using Azure API Management.

value.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
value.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
